channel.title: CVE Feed for Sensei -- Sensei Pro (WC Paid Courses)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sensei -- Sensei Pro (WC Paid Courses)

item.title: CVE-2024-34765|2024-08-02T02:59:22.377Z -- sensei -- sensei%20pro%20%28wc%20paid%20courses%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sensei Sensei Pro (WC Paid Courses) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sensei Pro (WC Paid Courses): from n/a through 4.23.1.1.23.1.
